steps.139: Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan
steps.141: Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan
steps.142: Add-Add tomato puree to the pan
steps.143: Take-Take the pan off the heat
steps.144: Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan
steps.146: Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan
steps.147: Add-Add 2 tbsp red chili powder to the pan
steps.150: puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer
steps.152: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle, add minced garlic
steps.153: simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick
steps.154: Heat-Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat
steps.155: Chop-Chop tomato roughly (anysize chunks are fine)
steps.156: Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl
steps.157: mix-mix well contents of the pan
